scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises letters; a pass from the Confederate Army Provost Marhsall for Captain Charlton Morgan to visit Charleston, South Carolina; a handwritten account of Morgan's Ohio Raid by Leeland Hathaway, 1st Lieutenant and Adjutant in Morgan's command; and a cabinet card photo of Thomas Hart Hunt. More than half of the letters are written to Henrietta Morgan giving condolences for the death of her nineteen-year-old son, Thomas, in battle against the Union soldiers.
